actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement that before a member of the Standby Reserve may be involuntarily ordered to active duty in time of war or national emergency the Director of Selective Service must determine that the member is available for active duty.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement that before a member of the Standby Reserve may be involuntarily ordered to active-duty in time of war or national emergency, the Director of Selective Service must determine that the member is available for active-duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to repeal the requirement that before a member of the Standby Reserve may be involuntarily ordered to active duty in time of war or national emergency the Director of Selective Service must determine that the member is available for active duty.
